title: Luxury Suite with Ocean View
description: A spacious luxury suite offering stunning ocean views, premium bedding, and a private balcony. Ideal for those seeking relaxation and a touch of elegance during their stay.

title: Deluxe King Room
description: Enjoy our deluxe king room, featuring a comfortable king-sized bed, modern amenities, and complimentary WiFi. Perfect for business travelers and couples.

title: Executive Suite with City View
description: Our executive suite offers breathtaking views of the city skyline, a separate living area, and personalized services to meet the needs of our premium guests.

title: Standard Queen Room
description: A cozy standard queen room offering a queen-sized bed, flat-screen TV, and all the essential amenities for a comfortable and budget-friendly stay.
